column2: You wander in the club management room as your Mistress prepares the ceremony.
After a while, your name is called, and a crowd gathers in for your collaring.
You're told to stand naked in front everyone and profess your desire to be owned.
Once you've spoken, it's your Mistress turn to address the solemn crowd.
Having heard both of your speeches, you're told to kneel for your slave collar.
The collar is fastened around your neck and you're asked one last time for consent.
Your Mistress locks it in place securely, preventing anyone from removing it.
The crowd cheers and the club Mistresses applauses, wishing a long-lasting relationship.
Once the collaring ceremony is done, you both head back to your private room.
